author: Yiannis Samaras
description: POUR the pepper-infused Campari, mandarin juice and chickpea water into a mixing tin, BLEND with a hand-held electronic whisk and pour into ice-filled glass. Top with the G&T float.Special ingredient #1: Gin & tonic float: a mix of 50% dry gin and tonic water.
name: The Spirit Of Rock
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Italian red bitter liqueur (infused with red florina pepper)
50 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR the pepper-infused Campari, mandarin juice and chickpea water into a mixing tin, BLEND with a hand-held electronic whisk and pour into ice-filled glass
Special ingredient #1: Gin & tonic float: a mix of 50% dry gin and tonic water

video.description:
POUR the pepper-infused Campari, mandarin juice and chickpea water into a mixing tin, BLEND with a hand-held electronic whisk and pour into ice-filled glass. Top with the G&T float.

Special ingredient #1: Gin & tonic float: a mix of 50% dry gin and tonic water.
video.name: HOWTO make The Spirit Of Rock
